column14: Processing of the MSH segment results in the creation of a new MessageHeader resource

Processing of the PID segment results in the creation of a new Patient resource
Incorporate PD1 content into the Patient created from the PID segment.

column14: Typically, each NK1 will be translated to either a new RelatedPerson resource or added as a new occurrence of Patient.contact, but it's possible to insert the NK1 data into both structures.

column9: If a ServiceRequest needs to be created for the receiver.
column14: Mapping to ServiceRequest as well is needed if the receiver is not the originator of the order to which this results message responds.  This mapping will be completed once OMG/OML mapping is sufficiently completed.  We will add the other segment mappings below to ServiceRequest then as well.

IF OBX-5 LST.count LESS THAN OR EQUALS 1
column14: Implementers should consider the use case where OBX-5 repeats in a given OBX segment. Because the Observation value element is not allowed to repeat, multiple occurrences of OBX-5 must be handled either through the creation of multiple Observation resources, the use of Observation components, the concatenation of the results into a single value or another solution appropriate for the data and the implementation.

column7: IF OBX-5 LST.count GREATER THAN 1
column14: Implementers should consider the use case where OBX-5 repeats in a given OBX segment. Because the Observation value element is not allowed to repeat, multiple occurrences of OBX-5 must be handled either through the creation of multiple Observation resources, the use of Observation components, the concatenation of the results into a single value or another solution appropriate for the data and the implementation. When multiple OBX segments are tranformed into Observation components in a single Observation resource, implementers should consider how the metadata associated with the result (eg performer, status, date/time, etc) are populated. If the OBX segments being combined into a single resource contain different metadata, it must be considered whether or not the use of components is appropriate.

IF PRT-9 VALUED OR IF PRT-14 VALUED
column14: Incorporate PRT content into the Observation created from the OBX segment in the same segment group when it represents observation location information.

column7: IF PRT-5 VALUED
column14: Incorporate PRT content into the Observation created from the OBX segment in the same segment group when it represents observation practitioner information.
